content: the crochet celtic stripes beanie for staying cozy and stylish in the autumn season crocheted with beautiful fall colors & celtic weave design this crochet beanie worked with a special stitch celtic weave in stripes the two rounds of celtic weave make one stripe by changing color after each two rounds and single_crochet round you can make celtic stripes you can make beanies for upcoming festive season in red green and white
